untrustedWorkspaces.description: Got some fs calls, exec handlers etc. Only used by dev mode but go with your gut.

chatcopycat.enableTrimming.description: Code Cleanup: Remove leading/trailing newlines, remove trailing spaces and tabs per row

chatcopycat.enableSpacesToTabs.description: Code Cleanup: Indent content using tabs (save tokens)

chatcopycat.enableLanguage.description: Code Metadata: Add languageId in code blocks

chatcopycat.enablePath.description: Code Metadata: Show file path in code blocks

chatcopycat.enablePosition.description: Code Metadata: Show line-num in code blocks or diagnostics sections

chatcopycat.enableDiagnostics.description: Code Context: Include code errors for each selection.

chatcopycat.customDiagnosticsMessage.description: Code Context: Add a custom text along with the diagnostics section if present

chatcopycat.enableInquiryMessage.description: Code Context: Toggle to always prompt for the type of inquiry with each copy action for customized context setting.

chatcopycat.defaultInquiryMessage.description: Code context: Set a default message that automatically populates during each fresh clipboard

chatcopycat.enableClipboardResetCombo.description: Copy: Enables the double-tap reset feature for the clipboard, allowing for quick clearing with a simple key combo.

chatcopycat.enableForceFocusLastTrackedE.description: Copy: Force document focus (when focus is locked outside of document).

chatcopycat.enableReferenceWithCopy.description: References: Optionality append references to copied selection

chatcopycat.fileTreeIgnoreList.description: FileTree: Paths to ignore in file-tree dialog. (gitignore syntax)

chatcopycat.definitionsAllowList.description: DefinitionsFiles: Add support for custom extensions (['.ts', '.js', 'Dockerfile'])

chatcopycat.definitionsIgnoreList.description: DefinitionsFiles: Paths to ignore in select dialog. (gitignore syntax)

chatcopycat.catLogMsgTruncateLen.description: Extension: Log message max length (0 = no limit)

chatcopycat.catLogDataTruncateLen.description: Extension: Log data object max length (0 = no limit)

chatcopycat.catEnabledFolderWatcher.description: Development: Reload window after completed build and install (file watcher)

commands.title: CCCat: Copy selection or document (or append to clipboard)
commands.description: Copies if no previous content, appends if file-tree or previous content exists in clipboard (and diagnostics/references/inquiry type). Can close inquiry dialog with copy key binding

commands.title: CCCat: Copy file-tree (or append to clipboard)
commands.description: Copies if no previous content, replaces previous file-tree in clipboard, prepends if inquiry is present in clipboard

commands.title: CCCat: Copy definitions from document (to clipboard)
CCCat: Copy definitions from files (to clipboard)
commands.description: Open a dialog and select which files or folders to copy definitions from, preserves selection. Can add paths to the ignore-list from dialog or reset selection cache

commands.title: CCCat: Copy symbol references (to clipboard)
commands.description: Copies references from selected symbol or if present in selection

commands.title: CCCat: Clear/reset clipboard
commands.description: Clear the clipboard. Default: double tap copy key binding to clear (within 0.5sec)

editor/context.when: editorTextFocus && !(inQuickOpen || terminalFocus || filesExplorerFocus || inSearchEditor || searchViewletFocus || replaceInputBoxFocus || outputFocus)

keybindings.description: Shortcut to close the inquiry dialog
